message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. That's the most I'm willing to pay.
I understand your position, Bob, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To make it work, I could come down to $17,000. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $14,000. I'd be willing to go up to $14,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference and settle at $16,000?  This is a very fair offer.
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice. I'd be willing to meet you halfway between $16,000 and $14,500, which would be $15,250. That's my final offer.
